index.title: Our Site
index.metadata: Tejas Automation — Automation without the hassle

items.title: What We Offer: Ease of Use
items.description: State of the art solutions focused on operations and performance tracking. Our application empowers operators and organizations in taking control of their tank data.

items.title: How We Are Different: Cost
items.description: Our  platform was designed with support and feedback from operators looking to break down the technical and functional silos they were facing when operating their systems. The end result is a user configurable, technology agnostic solution which drives reliability and efficiency across the organization.

items.title: Why Choose Us: Accuracy
items.description: Speed up accurate reporting by up to 90%. Have complete awareness of your plant performance from any device, any place and anytime.
